text: Hey is anyone interested in this app <https://formmaker.co.in/|https://formmaker.co.in/> you can create multi step form in HubSpot with all advanced option free to start if you stuck somewhere and need some help you can ping me thanks in advance
Hey there - interesting project! Just wondering: does this solution work well in terms of tracking? We integrated a HeyFlow Form before and run into the issue of loosing some analytics.
Yes it works well just give it a try and in case of any issue ping me
